ygData.subject: RE: Stein - No more - Addendum
ygData.messageBody:
+10 wis book in Erudin?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: HiFi Review [SMTP:hifireview@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:22 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein - No more - Addendum
>
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> I actually saw the updated stats at your site. This doesn't solve the
> problem. I already have a sacrificial dagger for the melee hand but I
> use a staff of withering most of the time. I can't use another
> frigging blunt weapon. If they want to make the quest impossible,
> that's fine, they can do it. But changing the item so it no longer
> does what people put their time and money into, is completely unfair.
> The Glowing Black Stone can go in both hands, so let people use that
> for Melee hand if they want. I may end up quitting the game over this
> one. They had better remove the quests for the Paw of Opalla and the
> +10 wis book in Erudin.
>
>
>
> --- Greg Short <eq@...> wrote:
> > From: "Greg Short" <eq@...>
> >
> > It appears the stats have changed on Test Server yet
> > again. Its now a 1
> > hand 7 / 43 1 hand blunt AS WELL as having all the
> > glowing stein stats.
> >
> > Full details on my site - I am too lazy to retype
> > heh.
> >
> > http://eq.castersrealm.com
> >
> > - baels
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> > To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 12:02 AM
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein - No more
> >
> >
> > > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> > >
> > > This is total BS. Players spent their entire
> > savings and traded away
> > > lots of equipment to get a left hand holdable Int
> > item which is now
> > > going to turn in to a melee-hand-only item. Why
> > do we even play this
> > > game anymore? Verant is going to get a bill for
> > my time wasted on a
> > > now useless item. 7/43? What a joke!
> > >
> > > Q
> > >
> > > --- "baelish.aust.com" <eq@...>
> > wrote:
> > > > From: "baelish.aust.com" <eq@...>
> > > >
> > > > The stein is going to be nerfed. Forget the
> > farming
> > > > such as what has been
> > > > going on below, because next patch it is outta
> > here.
> > > >
> > > > http://eq.castersrealm.com has the details.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > - Baels.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: <Baltoro@...>
> > > > To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 3:04 PM
> > > > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > > From: Baltoro@...
> > > > >
> > > > > I've done it 4 times and will do it again
> > twice
> > > > tonight. This is to
> > > > replace
> > > > > the 4 I sold or traded, will have one for
> > myself
> > > > and one for the druid who
> > > > is
> > > > > helps me gather the ingredients.
> > > > > The 4 steins have really raked in untold
> > riches,
> > > > by my count 4000
> > > > platinum, a
> > > > > pair of dwarven workboots, Shimmering orb, the
> > > > list goes on and on.
> > > > >
> > > > > After doing it 4 times I decided to go to
> > kaladim
> > > > and see how my faction
> > > > > decline was progressing. I found the guards
> > > > glowered at me dubiously
> > > > > including the king himself. I went out to the
> > > > chessboard, ruins, etc and
> > > > > bought 90 bone chips for 1g each from the
> > people
> > > > hunting and turned them
> > > > in a
> > > > > few at a time to improve my faction. After
> > that,
> > > > the king regarded me
> > > > > indifferently but the guards still regarded me
> > > > dubiously. What if another
> > > > > new quest pops up that requires us to go to
> > > > Kaladim? I don't want to
> > > > think
> > > > > about it. After I get the 2 steins tonight I
> > will
> > > > charge 2000 platinum to
> > > > > complete the quest for someone provided they
> > > > gather the ingredients
> > > > > themselves. For weeks i'm gonna save up
> > > > bonechips till I have about 300
> > > > and
> > > > > go back to turn them in if the guy deals with
> > me
> > > > anymore. Hell, i'm not
> > > > even
> > > > > sure if its worth 2000 plat for the hits
> > > > anymore....
> > > > >
> > > > > Orbane Encephalon
> > > > > 22 Enchanter
> > > > > Fenin Ro
